A virtual reality experience that transports users into a world where they are the shadow. Users can explore and interact with the world from a unique perspective, and even manipulate the shadows to create their own world.

A mobile game where players take on the role of a shadow, navigating through a dark world filled with obstacles and enemies. Players must use their shadows to their advantage, manipulating them to solve puzzles and defeat enemies.

A short film that explores the emotional journey of a shadow as it navigates through different environments, encountering various characters and situations. The film uses stop-motion animation to bring the shadow to life in a unique and captivating way.

A shadow puppet theater show that brings the story of the lonely shadow to life through intricate puppets and animations. The show combines traditional shadow puppetry with modern storytelling techniques to create a one-of-a-kind theatrical experience.

A personalized shadow journaling experience that allows users to explore their own shadows through writing and reflection. The app guides users through a series of prompts and exercises, encouraging them to delve into their subconscious mind and uncover their deepest desires and fears.
